cards.title: Supporting Our Troops
cards.description: We love giving back to our community by supporting our troops.

cards.title: Events & Festivals
cards.description: Catch us at local festivals, parties, and diverse events around Cedar Rapids.

cards.title: Inside the Truck
cards.description: Experience our mobile kitchen where every dish is made fresh on the spot.

cards.title: Our Community
cards.description: Our customers and team are like family. We cherish every moment shared.

cards.title: Food is Love
cards.description: Our food is a celebration of flavor and heart. Every dish we create is crafted with pride, passion, and a belief that good food brings people together.

cards.title: On the Move
cards.description: Our truck is always on the move, bringing fresh flavors to the streets of Cedar Rapids.

testimonials.review: Everything about this truck is wonderful. Fresh and delicious, a must-try in Cedar Rapids!

testimonials.review: Ope is the best and the crab rangoons are 10/10! The Street Food Fighter never disappoints.
